Rialto.Rialto station:
Rialto station (also known as the John Longville Depot) is a Metrolink San Bernardino Line station located at 292 South Palm Avenue in Rialto, San Bernardino County, California, just south of Rialto Avenue off of Riverside Avenue. It has 489 free parking spaces.
The station is owned by the City of Rialto, and was designed as a replica of the former 1888-built Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway frame-built structure.
